Package neqsim.process.controllerdevice.structure

Class RatioControllerStructure

java.lang.Object
neqsim.process.controllerdevice.structure.RatioControllerStructure
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ControlStructureInterface
public class RatioControllerStructure extends Object implements ControlStructureInterface
Ratio control structure adjusting a controller set-point such that the controlled variable maintains a specified ratio to a reference measurement.
Author:
esol

  • Constructor Details

    • RatioControllerStructure

      public RatioControllerStructure(ControllerDeviceInterface controller, MeasurementDeviceInterface ratioMeasurement)
      Create a ratio controller structure.
      Parameters:
      controller - feedback controller acting on the manipulated variable
      ratioMeasurement - measurement providing the base for the ratio
